mapper.sql: category_id, category_name, category_icon, parent_id, view_permissions, create_time, create_user_id, update_time, update_user_id, deleted, version
mapper.insert:
insert into bbs_category (category_name, category_icon, parent_id, view_permissions, create_time, create_user_id, update_time, update_user_id, deleted, version) values
(#{item.categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.categoryIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.viewPermissions,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.version,jdbcType=BIGINT})
